Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with a unique set of features and benefits that we believe could greatly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $180. This price includes a limited-time discount that reflects our confidence in its value to you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your use of our product at a special rate. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
